com.hcl.voltmx.middleware.dataobject

Class Dataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hcl.voltmx.middleware.dataobject.Dataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Dataset
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A Dataset is list of Records, identified using an unique id.
    See Also:
    Record, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int index
      Deprecated. 
      As of Foundry 7.3.2, instead use getIndex() or setIndex(int).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dataset()
      Creates an empty Dataset.
      Dataset(String id)
      Creates an empty Dataset with given id.

      • getRecord

        public Record getRecord(int indexToGet)
        Gets the Record at the specified index from the list of Records contained in the Dataset.
        Parameters:
        indexToGet - The index to get
        Returns:
        The Record corresponding to index. If index is out of range, this returns null.
        See Also:
        Record

      • getRecordOrder

        @Deprecated
public Record getRecordOrder(int order)
        Deprecated. As of Foundry 7.3.2, this method is redundant as order is not used anymore. To get Record by index, use getRecord(int).
        Gets the Record with the specified order from the list of Records contained in the Dataset.
        Parameters:
        order - The order
        Returns:
        The Record with specified order. If no matching record found, this returns null.
        See Also:
        Record
